Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a solo homer in the first inning
David Peralta hit a two-out, two-run homer in the second inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The best-of-five series is now tied at one game apiece
Others: The Dodgers are going to rely on Walker Buehler and rookie Landon Knack for the rest of the series
The Dodgers had an opportunity to take a commanding 2-0 lead over the Padres but lost Game 2
